Title: Arranging a battlefield on the threshing floor of the bumper harvest
Designer: Yang Benhua (杨奔骅)Jinshan xian ting xin gongxiao she (金山县亭新供销社)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Propagandist performing for peasants bringing in the grain harvest - note their shadows in the foreground. She uses a picture-storybook, the image in view is Liu Xiazhi denounces Confucius' second child (柳下跖痛斥孔老二) - a story used in the campaign against Lin Biao and Confucius. In her pocket is a brochure by Yao Wenyuan, On the Social Basis of the Lin Biao Anti-Party Clique (论林彪反党集团的社会基础), first published March 1975.
